comments_since_last_sample.body:
As a reminder, this subreddit [is for civil discussion.](/r/politics/wiki/index#wiki_be_civil)

In general, be courteous to others. Debate/discuss/argue the merits of ideas, don't attack people. Personal insults, shill or troll accusations, hate speech, any suggestion or support of harm, violence, or death, and other rule violations can result in a permanent ban. 

If you see comments in violation of our rules, please report them.

 For those who have questions regarding any media outlets being posted on this subreddit, please click [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/politics/wiki/approveddomainslist) to review our details as to our approved domains list and outlet criteria.

***


*I am a bot, and this action was performed automatically. Please [contact the moderators of this subreddit](/message/compose/?to=/r/politics) if you have any questions or concerns.*

Biden wouldn't be blamed for the inexcusable actions of Manchin and Synema if they were open about their Republican beliefs. Kick them out of the Democratic Party now! Let Republicans be associated with their Republican actions.

The potential downside is Democrats would lose the ability to install non-rightwing judges. Anybody else would never get confirmed. Howver, Biden should grow a pair and accept this fate because he can use weekly speeches and public rallies to point out the failed policies of Republicans and their commitment to sell our futures to a handful of rich donors. Remove AG Garland and allow the DOJ to prosecute Reoubl8can ringleaders of the January 6th crimes, including Republican Senators.

No more nice guy, Biden. You're failing us in this generational crisis.

Democrats unifying = doing what the Koch network wants.

“Centrists” and corporate dems are the ones being difficult. The rest of the party is just trying to help people and listen to scientists
Is it time to realize that we’re a failed state? Red states and blue states can’t coexist. Let the MAGAs have their poverty stricken ultra capitalist fever dream. The rest of us need to move on.
In better words, they completely and totally fucked
Honestly i do not really care about Bidens future i am much more concerned with the gutting of the climate legislation.

We eat our own.

We are a circular firing squad.

We are Democrats.
Couldn’t the same title be used for Republicans, Independents, Libertarians, short people, and antique collectors? If only we could all unify, our future is secured!
Oh FFS. Sinema and Manchin are DINO.
Oh word

there is unity based on individual policies. if the Senate or House is in gridlock, allow us to bypass Congress with a federal referendum vote on the policy. eliminate their desire for false spectral. 

their impass would create a more direct democracy.

Fuck this headline.

Party unity isn't the problem. It's not progressives vs moderates, it's the Dems vs Manchin and Sinema.
Why is it on the dems? Why not call out the GQP? Oh wait the media treats the GQP with kid gloves.

What about the country’s future? I think we should put that front and center. 

If you do that, then you should be asking yourself why they’re bothering with these bills at all when democracy is still at risk. Trump exposed gaping holes in the foundations of our democracy, and not a single one has been patched yet. In my mind none of this stuff matters until republicans are dealt with because they’ve already demonstrate a willingness, even a strong desire, to step outside the bounds of law and tradition to achieve their goals. So, why the fuck are we concerned with bridges and daycare when republicans are literally trying to invade the capitol to stop an election?

The trouble is, voters on the left are so damn fractured that theres no way their elected officials could adequately represent them while also unifying within their party.

All this woke culture is making endless enemies among people who are supposed to be on the same team.
The USA can’t afford these programmes

Honestly, 2 of 3 of the most important things have already happened

1. Trump's removal from office
2. Responsible Federal response to the pandemic
3. The 3rd item better happen: Supreme Court Justice Breyer retires before either Manchin or Kristen Enema switches parties and gives Mitch McConnell Senate Majority Leadership control, and control of the Senate Judicial committee

I hoped for more.. but 50/50 Senate, with Dem Senators in Red States was just not going to advance the progressive ball many of us had hoped

Until then.. keeping Manchin and Anema democrats, means Biden can continue to appoint federal judges.. and that's about it.
This dude is a conservative, corporatist "Democrat" himself. When he says unify he means unify with Manchin and Sienma.

Step 1. Force Sinema and Manchin to join the GOP

Step 2. Dust off hands.
Too much personal avarice.  Sometimes after a few drinks I think maybe we shouldn’t fucking *pay* politicians; but then I sober up and realize my brilliant ideas aren’t appreciated by the pier elite.
If they won't, then there won't be a Democrat party eventually. Fascists don't like competition
we're boned
So we're fucked then

[This](https://www.brainyquote.com/photos_tr/en/w/willrogers/122697/willrogers1-2x.jpg)

Plus &ccedil;a change.
Tell that to the two dip-shits in the Senate!
